name: Project Resolve (Notaekwhitedge)
description:
Play as four friends who find themselves stuck inside of a nightmare in this horror RPG with elements such as Sanity management, Wellbeing and random events and multiple endings, can you survive the dream and awake unscathed? 

Currently the game is in an extremely early stage, and lot will likely change, however this should provide a good idea of what the system and dungeons will look like!
